meanings.definition: (adjective) relating to or characteristic of a chronic condition
meanings.sent1: The chronic cough kept her up all night.
meanings.sent2: Living with chronic pain can be challenging.
meanings.sent3: The chronic alarm clock never seems to work properly.
meanings.sent4: Her chronic lateness became a running joke among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The chronic fatigue made it hard for him to focus at work.

meanings.definition: (verb) to persist or continue for a long time

meanings.sent3: The song's catchy tune chronics in my head all day.
